ygData.subject: Re: MeowMix
ygData.msgSnippet: Perplex: It may not look like it, but I feel the same way. My parents were both killed in cold blood, it is a terrible thing. Zeni misses them terribly, you

Perplex: It may not look like it, but I feel the same way. My parents were
both killed in cold blood, it is a terrible thing. Zeni misses them
terribly, you aren't alone. Gramps misses them, too, my mom was his
daughter, and my dad was his daughter's husband. It isn't very fun in my
memories neither, Trinity, but I'm trying to replace the bad memories with
the good ones, I continue to do so every day of my life, and so does
Gramps...and Zeni. Technosis has faced hardships, too. Maybe more awful ones
than we'll ever know, and she's still trucking along. Come back with me,
Trinity, don't run away. Zeni needs you...
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, November 30, 2000 6:21 PM
Subject: Re: MeowMix


> Trinity::
>
> She sat down and looked at the ground. " I don't know where I'm
> going. I'm just mad.  My mom and dad are gone.  I miss then so
> much."  she started crying.
